name: Tallest Tower
description:
The game takes place inside a tower, which the player must climb to the top.

You start your journey without any skills, and acquires them during the run. These skills can help you deal better with enemies or give you more possibilities to deal with the difficulty of the climb.

The Team

Anna Katharina Krause  - UI/UX Design, Game Designer 

Afonso Rodenbusch - Character,  Environment Artist and Game Designer

Gabriel Beltz Mumbach - Gameplay Sistems Programmer

Henrique Barbisan Bittencourt - UI and Sound Programmer

Renan Mack Duarte - Level Designer

Alessandro Peixoto de Lima - Orientador

Eduardo Fernando Muller - Orientador
